queries.query: plant-themed combat guardian that communicates telepathically with its master
queries.variant: guardian that uses plants in combat and can talk to its master through thoughts

queries.query: medium-sized construct with a thorny vine attack that ensnares enemies
queries.variant: construct of medium size that uses thorned vines to trap foes

queries.query: stealthy creature that thrives in plant-covered environments
queries.variant: creature that hides well in areas filled with plants

queries.query: golem that is immune to poison and resistant to physical attacks
queries.variant: this golem takes no damage from poison and is less affected by physical attacks

queries.query: Vine Golem's special abilities including telepathy and battlefield control
queries.variant: special powers of the Vine Golem such as mind communication and controlling enemies
